transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji, L Kadia Tech company mein baat ho rahi hai na sir?
Customer: Haan, haan, haan, haan.
Executive: Main Vishal baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART office se sir. Kaise hain?
Customer: Boliye, boliye. Thik hai.
Executive: Woh aapke concern aaye the na sir IndiaMART pe jo PVD IndiaMART ke regarding sir.
Customer: Haan, haan, haan, haan.
Executive: Aapki baat hogi hogi hamari team se Sandhya ji se aur Ajay ji se. Abhi mere paas PVD IndiaMART kaise out ho gaya jo aap log proposal de raha hai PVD IndiaMART mein. Ye kab se ho gaya isko?
Executive: Ye to bahut pehle bahut pehle band ho gaya tha sir PVD IndiaMART ka.
Customer: Out ho gaya mere paas.
Executive: Aapne in between kabhi payment li nahi hogi shayad isliye aapko pata nahi chal paya hoga sir.
Customer: Nahi kam se kam ek saal do saal liya nahi hai ek dedh saal.
Executive: Haan ji. Kyunki ek saal pehle hi humne sir isko na band kar diya tha.
Customer: Direct India.
Executive: Bahut sara party tha direct IndiaMART pe payment karta hai. IndiaMART through payment karta hai to woh log kaise karenge usko bataye.
Executive: Main batata hu sir usme. Dekho PVD IndiaMART mein sir aapke paas hum online payment mode hi provide karte the sir. Correct?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir to uske liye uske liye sir dekho issues kya create hote the sir ki hamara usme involvement hota tha bematlab mein sir. Jabki aapka aur buyer ka aapas mein deal hoti hai sir. Thik hai. To isiliye company ne yahi customer ke upar hi kiya hai ki aap apne buyer se jo bhi baat kar rahe ho jo bhi aapka discussion hota hai aap uske sath clear kar sakte hain aur apna unse payment le sakte hain direct apne payment account mein sir. Thik hai apne account ke andar sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur ye even sabke level pe sir pure IndiaMART pe hi band hai sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aisa nahi hai ki humne koi aapke liye kuch aisa alag se kiya hai sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Thik hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To main keh raha tha sir iske alawa to koi aur concern nahi hai na?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Thik hai. To fir main jo concern aapka yaha par aaya tha main close kar du sir isko?
Customer: Close kar dijiye.
Executive: Thik hai sir. Further agar koi bhi assistant chahiye ho hamari side se please aap hame is number pe connect kar sakte hain sir. Thik hai?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer asks why PVD IndiaMART is out.



Resolution:

- Executive explains PVD IndiaMART is discontinued.

- Executive explains direct payment process with buyers.



Next Steps: 

- Issue resolved.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- pvd indiamart, payment, online payment
